title: Vase, "Red Army Soldier", 1933
markings: Marks: Incised in clay on underside: 25/38
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Four-sided, slightly tapered at middle; green bisque with contrasting whiterelief image of Red Army Soldier saluting with gun; on the other side an inscription in Russian, raised in relief, "Fifteenth Anniversary of the Red Army."

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, "Red Army Soldier", 1933.
1933. Porcelain (bisque). The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-85.
